author: Abigail Leonard / Tokyo
title: 2020 Was Supposed to Be Japan’s Year. Delaying the Olympics Is the Just the Latest Gut-Punch
description: The delay of the Tokyo Olympic games until 2021, coupled with the coronavirus pandemic, is a one-two punch to Japan in what was meant to be a big year.
content: Michio Yunoki’s hotel was suffering even before Prime Minister Shinzo Abe announced the 2020 Tokyo Olympics would be delayed one year. Nearly 90% of the guests who had booked rooms in March had cancelled because of coronavirus travel restrictions, and with th… [+6864 chars]
